column1: I am bored of chocolate whey, everything tastes the same now
Why doesn't MuscleBlaze have Indian flavors like kesar or elaichi
Masala chai protein would be amazing post workout
Fruity flavors like watermelon or orange would be refreshing in summers
Chocolate is too sweet, need something dark cocoa
Electrolytes should come in nimbu pani flavor
Gummies with blueberry or mixed berry would sell a lot
Unflavored whey is hard to drink daily
Most protein powders upset my stomach due to sweetness
